## 📅 Upcoming Events & Trainings
📘 Training

Friday Locker Room

📍 Acadia Office
🗓 Fri, Jul 18, 2025
🕒 10:00 AM – 11:30 AM

Headline: Build Habits That Drive Results — One Week at a Time.

About this: This session is all about building consistency, accountability, and clarity in your business. Learn how to calibrate weekly, course-correct in real time, and keep your momentum strong with the support of your peers.

Benefits to You: Gain the structure and habits you need to build a business that grows week after week — with the power of accountability.

Why This Matters: Consistency Creates Confidence

Call to Action: Lock in your success — show up and get aligned.

Text Your Team:
🔥 Friday at 10AM — Productivity Training at the Acadia Office. Calibrate your business, lock in your goals, and grow together.

Post on Social Media:

🎉 Event

5 Years to Freedom

📍 Acadia Office
🗓 Sun, Jul 20, 2025
🕒 10:00 AM – 12:00 PM

Headline: 5 Years of Focus. A Lifetime of Freedom.

About this: Celebrate wins, grow your vision, and hear from someone who’s done it. Jennifer Carnegie, a newly inducted Hall of Fame leader with 30+ years of experience, will share how five years of focused effort can build a business—and a life—you’re proud of.

Guest Speaker: Jennifer Carnegie — 30+ years of experience National Sales Director Inducted to Primerica Hall of Fame in July 2025

Benefits to You: Discover how to create long-term success in a business that helps others while transforming your own life.

Why This Matters: Success is earned—now it's your turn.

Call to Action: Register now, show up early, and bring someone with you. This could change your future.

Text Your Team:

What You’ll Learn: How top earners think differently, Daily disciplines that lead to explosive growth, Mindset shifts to overcome fear and hesitation
